channel.title: Lumina on Dr. Elliot
channel.description: Recent content in Lumina on Dr. Elliot

item.title: About Lumina
item.description: Lumina Game Engine Lumina is my ongoing game engine project written in C++. I’ve been working on it for about two years, and what started as a side experiment has turned into one of my biggest passions. Originally, I was more interested in game development itself, making projects, prototypes, and ideas come to life. But over time, I found that what really grabbed me wasn’t the games — it was the engines behind them.
